ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: You can kite them at 24. It s ROUGH at 24, but possible if you find a lower level one. My record at 24 was 2 of 6. Now, at 28, I can kite them every single
ygData.messageBody:
You can kite them at 24. It's ROUGH at 24, but possible if you find a lower
level one. My record at 24 was 2 of 6. Now, at 28, I can kite them every
single time...no problem. Some white, some yellow, a FEW are still red.

-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Sorensen [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 1:03 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)


From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>

I'd recommend a group around mid 20's at minimum.
They do get double attacks of about 70 damage and have
a few hit points. I think all quest items for the
armor are suited for mid 20s. (if you are a kiter, you
may be able to get them sooner).

Belgarth

--- Trevalien <trevalien@...> wrote:
> From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>
> What lvl are Aviak Avocets im asuming i cant kill
> one at lvl 15
>
> Trevalien
